name: Transit (Gammaromeo)
description:
Transit is a game about getting commuters as efficiently as possible to their destinations and prevent them from being stuck in the unending loop of the metro system. Players have control to switch the train tracks to guide the train in the right path.

CONTROLS: Click on the switch buttons on the bottom left to control the direction of the train tracks from the corresponding stations as shown by the arrows

Game was made for Ludum dare 47 with the theme 'Stuck in a loop'

Please note: Alt +F4 might not work in the game. So you may have to right click on the bottom taskbar window and close. Sorry!
